valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Thu 5 Feb 2026 to 00:00 (UTC) on Fri 6 Feb 2026
general_synopsis: Low southwest Plymouth 972 losing its identity

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 7 or gale 8 decreasing 4 to 6. In northeast, southeasterly 4 to 6 backing easterly 2 to 4.
Sea state
In southwest, high becoming very rough, then rough later. in northeast, rough or very rough becoming slight or moderate.
Weather
In southwest, sleet or snow at first. In northeast, mainly fair.
Visibility
In southwest, moderate to very poor, becoming good. In northeast, good.
Viking.gale_warning:
Gale warning
Issued:
15:48 (UTC) on Wed 4 Feb 2026
Southeasterly severe gale force 9 decreasing gale force 8 soon
Viking.wind: In southwest, southeasterly 7 or gale 8 decreasing 4 to 6. In northeast, southeasterly 4 to 6 backing easterly 2 to 4.
Viking.sea_state: In southwest, high becoming very rough, then rough later. in northeast, rough or very rough becoming slight or moderate.
Viking.weather: In southwest, sleet or snow at first. In northeast, mainly fair.
Viking.visibility: In southwest, moderate to very poor, becoming good. In northeast, good.
